testcase.name: 冒烟测试 - 关键功能 › 网站基本功能正常 @smoke

failure.message: smoke.spec.js:5:3 网站基本功能正常 @smoke

testcase.failure:
[chromium] › smoke.spec.js:5:3 › 冒烟测试 - 关键功能 › 网站基本功能正常 @smoke ───────────────────────────────────
Error: expect(page).toHaveTitle(expected) failed
Expected pattern: /Genomics and Artificial Intelligence/ Received string: "Hong Kong JC STEM Lab of Genomics and AI in Healthcare" Timeout: 5000ms
Call log: - Expect "toHaveTitle" with timeout 5000ms 9 × unexpected value "Hong Kong JC STEM Lab of Genomics and AI in Healthcare"
6 | // 访问首页 7 | await page.goto('/'); > 8 | await expect(page).toHaveTitle(/Genomics and Artificial Intelligence/); | ^ 9 | 10 | // 检查主要元素存在 11 | await expect(page.locator('h1')).toBeVisible(); at D:\Documents\genomics-in-healthcare.github.io\tests\smoke.spec.js:8:24

testcase.name: 冒烟测试 - 关键功能 › 移动端基本功能 @smoke
testcase.failure:
[chromium] › smoke.spec.js:24:3 › 冒烟测试 - 关键功能 › 移动端基本功能 @smoke ───────────────────────────────────
Error: expect(locator).toBeVisible() failed
Locator: locator('nav') Expected: visible Received: hidden Timeout: 5000ms
Call log: - Expect "toBeVisible" with timeout 5000ms - waiting for locator('nav') 9 × locator resolved to <nav id="desktopNav" class="md-app-bar__actions">…</nav> - unexpected value "hidden"
